titles.title: Corrosion Prevention Act of 2009
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to encourage the use of corrosion prevention and mitigation measures in the construction and maintenance of business energy-related property.
Corrosion Prevention Act of 2009

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Corrosion Prevention Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a two-year business-related tax credit for 50% of net expenditures for engineering design, materials, and application and installation of corrosion prevention and mitigation technology for energy-related property comprised primarily of metals susceptible to corrosion.
